text: Sharad Kohli (born April 2, 1966) is an Indian economist, entrepreneur, and speaker. He is the founder and chairman of the KCC Group. Sharad Kohli was born and raised in Ghaziabad, India. == Books == * The Story of Tansen: Master of Melody == References == == Other websites == * Category:Business people Category:1996 births Category:Indian economists Category:Indian people
title: Sharad Kohli
